attributes.action: Provide Chattenden primary with a road crossing patrol at the zebra crossing.
attributes.additional_details: Chattenden primary staff and parents are growing more concerned with the safety of staff, students and parents while travelling too and from school because the volume of traffic and lack of consideration by some drivers at the zebra crossing, there have been several near misses involving children and cars.
attributes.background: Consider replacing the road crossing patrol officer as parents children and staff of the school are becoming increasingly scared for everyone’s safety while trying to cross at the zebra crossing

rejection.details:
You could raise your issue with a local councillor who represents you. You can use this page to find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them:
https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors
